descriptionHtml:
With beginning of this new year, I wanted to present my ongoing work on a new land creation : a lost island... somewhere.

Welcome in my world!

Sorry, no file to download yet (only screenshots)... Still lot of work to do!
I simply wish I could finish it one day!

Note that all models are original ones. Part of this work was first made for oblivion, and used in an unplublished mod.

--------------------------------------------------------------------
Credits
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Great thank all the community for all the mods realized.
I have to admit that I downloaded plenty of them and learned a lot for modding, by analyzing the way they are done.

Note that this is only a WIP and some material (mainly textures) could have been used just to go faster in the rendering.
All credits will be made and authorizations will be asked, when files will be posted.

Special thanks to:
- Elinen, and her great tutorial's on world creation for Hoddminir : http://hoddminir.blogspot.com
- Ethatron, for Oscape (used for lod generation) : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4727
- LightWave, for TESAnnwyn (used for the landscape generation) : http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1311730-release-tesannwyn-and-tes4qlod-for-skyrim/
- dimon99 for the UNP female body I use in the game : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709

Thanks to :
- Growlf for the design of the Santa Clothes which the shown one is based on. (Yes, it was for oblivion... but I find it funny!)
- Yuril for his ice texture (used in the screeshots) : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5388
- The Blender and Niftool Teams
- Bethesda for their games

Special thanks to the wteam for the work made together on the "Archipel" mod for oblivion!
http://wteamoblivionmod-for.forum2jeux.com/forum
author: baronf
